languages.text: {n}Вы неловко отступаете назад, путаетесь в собственных ногах и резко взмахиваете руками, пытаясь удержать равновесие. Сервиторы реагируют на движение: с истошным визгом сочленений они выпрямляются и бросаются вперед!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы неловко отступаете назад, путаетесь в собственных ногах и резко взмахиваете руками, пытаясь удержать равновесие. Сервиторы реагируют на движение: с истошным визгом сочленений они выпрямляются и бросаются вперед!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your hands in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with their joints shrieking deafeningly, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your hands in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with their joints shrieking deafeningly, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your hands in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with their joints shrieking deafeningly, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your hands in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with their joints shrieking deafeningly, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

{n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

languages.text: {n}你笨拙地朝后退了一步，却被自己的脚绊了一下。你挥舞着双手，试图保持平衡。机仆们对你的动作做出了反应。它们的关节发出了震耳欲聋的尖锐声音，挺直了身体，朝你扑了过来！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你笨拙地朝后退了一步，却被自己的脚绊了一下。你挥舞着双手，试图保持平衡。奴工们对你的动作做出了反应。它们的关节发出了震耳欲聋的尖锐声音，挺直了身体，朝你扑了过来！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Retrocedes incómodamente, tropiezas con tus propios pies y agitas los brazos para intentar mantener el equilibrio. Los servidores reaccionan al movimiento. ¡Con un sonido ensordecedor de sus articulaciones, se enderezan y se abalanzan hacia delante!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Retrocedes incómodamente, tropiezas con tus propios pies y agitas los brazos para intentar mantener el equilibrio. Los servidores reaccionan al movimiento. ¡Con un sonido ensordecedor de sus articulaciones, se enderezan y se abalanzan hacia delante!{/n}

languages.text: {n}ギクシャクと後ずさりしたことで足が絡まる。あなたはバランスをとろうと腕をバタバタさせた。サーヴィター達はその動きに反応し、接続部わから耳をつんざくような金切り声を上げ、真っ直ぐ前方に突進してきた！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ギクシャクと後ずさりしたことで足が絡まる。あなたはバランスをとろうと腕をバタバタさせた。サーヴィター達はその動きに反応し、接続部わから耳をつんざくような金切り声を上げ、真っ直ぐ前方に突進してきた！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weichst ungeschickt zurück, stolperst über deine eigenen Füße und ruderst mit den Armen, um das Gleichgewicht zu halten. Die Servitoren reagieren auf die Bewegung – mit ohrenbetäubendem Kreischen ihrer Gelenke richten sie sich auf und stürzen sich auf dich!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weichst ungeschickt zurück, stolperst über deine eigenen Füße und ruderst mit den Armen, um das Gleichgewicht zu halten. Die Servitoren reagieren auf die Bewegung – mit ohrenbetäubendem Kreischen ihrer Gelenke richten sie sich auf und stürzen sich auf dich!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous trébuchez maladroitement en tentant de reculer et battez des bras pour tenter de conserver votre équilibre. Les servitors réagissent à vos mouvements. Ils se redressent et bondissent en avant dans un grincement assourdissant de leurs articulations !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous trébuchez maladroitement en tentant de reculer et battez des bras pour tenter de conserver votre équilibre. Les servitors réagissent à vos mouvements. Ils se redressent et bondissent en avant dans un grincement assourdissant de leurs articulations !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf bir şekilde geri çekilirken kendi ayaklarına takılıyor ve dengeni korumak için kollarını çırpıyorsun. Hizmetörler ise harekete tepki veriyor. Eklemlerinden gelen sağır edici ciyaklamalarla doğrulup üstüne atılıyorlar!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You back away awkwardly, trip over your own feet, and flap your arms in an attempt to keep your balance. The servitors react to the movement — with deafening shrieks from their joints, they straighten and lunge forward!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaf bir şekilde geri çekilirken kendi ayaklarına takılıyor ve dengeni korumak için kollarını çırpıyorsun. Servitörler ise harekete tepki veriyor. Eklemlerinden gelen sağır edici ciyaklamalarla doğrulup üstüne atılıyorlar!{/n}
